mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, T1.* FROM (select * from board order by num) T1 WHERE ROWNUM <= #{listSize} ) WHERE #{start} <= RNUM
mapper.update: update board set hits=hits+1 where num = #{num}
mapper.select: SELECT stock FROM products WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO products (name, description, price, stock) VALUES (#{name}, #{description}, #{price}, #{stock})
